pkgmetadata.longdescription: Web Client/Wrapper to the 'Figma API' // An easy-to-use web client/wrapper for the 'Figma API' https://www.figma.com/developers/api. It allows you to bring all data from a 'Figma' file to your 'R' session. This includes the data of all objects that you have drawn in this file, and their respective canvas/page metadata.
